item.title: My Current Opinions on Hosting Web Apps
item.description: A little while back, I was chatting with some tech friends about my experience using Fly and Neon for hosting web apps that are under active development. Between these two services and their low pricing for small projects, my total bill for the month was only $0.01 (Fly doesn’t even collect invoices below $5.00). I shared how Fly and Neon seemed like a great fit for projects that are a work in progress but that I’m not sure if I’d use them for production services.
